product_name: Showers Pass Transit Bike Jacket - Women's
long_description: Built to be worn over street clothes, the Showers Pass Transit bike jacket provides waterproof and breathable protection for your daily commute. Ripstop nylon fabric features a 3-layer waterproof, breathable membrane for durable, comfortable protection; fully taped seams prevent water from penetrating through seams. Cut full for extra room to layer; full cut also extends range of movement without binding or twisting. Large opening pit zippers and 2-way, waterproof front zipper allow maximum ventilation control. Dropped rear flap provides extra protection in the riding position; cinch cord along waist seals in warmth. For added ventilation, oversize cuffs scoop air up your sleeves while open; cuffs feature rip-and-stick tabs to keep wind and rain out. Soft, moisture-wicking tricot lines interior chin guard and inner collar for enhanced comfort. External chest pocket and 2 hand pockets feature water-resistant zippers to keep contents dry; chest pocket has an internal headphone exit port for an MP3 player. Mesh-lined large back panel vent for flow through ventilation; light loop allows you to attach a safety light (not included). Showers Pass Transit jacket features an abundant amount of 3M Scotchlite(TM) reflective taping to boost visibility to others. Collar features tabs to attach a Showers Pass hood (not included).
short_description: Built to be worn over street clothes, the Showers Pass Transit bike jacket provides waterproof and breathable protection for your daily commute.
